participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

smarte_ss_mdf_regroup_to.Description: Number timeout for regroup items in the mixed-digit arithmetic task

smarte_ss_mdf_challenge_err.Description: Number error for challenge items in the mixed-digit arithmetic task

smarte_ss_mdf_challenge_nt.Description: Attempted items for challenge items in the mixed-digit arithmetic task

smarte_ss_mdf_challenge_rt.Description: (Correct) response times for challenge items in the mixed-digit arithmetic task

smarte_ss_mdf_challenge_to.Description: Number timeout for challenge items in the mixed-digit arithmetic task

smarte_ss_mdf_noregroup_acc.Description: Proportion of accuracy for no-regroup items in the mixed-digit arithmetic task

smarte_ss_mdf_challenge_corr.Description: Number correct for challenge items in the mixed-digit arithmetic task

smarte_ss_mdf_total_corr.Description: Total number correct for the mixed-digit arithmetic task (SMARTE mixed-digit arithmetic subscore)

smarte_ss_sdf_norule_acc.Description: Proportion of accuracy for no-rule items in the single-digit arithmetic task

smarte_ss_mdf_challenge_acc.Description: Proportion of accuracy for challenge items in the mixed-digit arithmetic task

smarte_ss_all_total_corr.Description: Total number correct across all three SMARTE subscores (SMARTE total score)

smarte_ss_completedenumeration.Description: Was the dot enumeration task completed? (Exclude if not 1) | 0=Not completed; 1=Completed

smarte_ss_completed_fluency.Description: Was the single-digit arithmetic task completed? (Exclude if not 1) | 0=Not completed; 1=Completed

smarte_ss_completed_recall.Description: Was the mixed-digit arithmetic task completed? (Exclude if not 1) | 0=Not completed; 1=Completed
